references.paper_title: Communication-Efficient Learning of Deep Networks from Decentralized Data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of federated learning, introducing many core concepts used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Advances and open problems in federated learning
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of federated learning, including challenges and future research directions, which is highly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-rank adaptation of large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces a parameter-efficient fine-tuning method (LoRA) crucial for enabling efficient federated learning of large language models, which is a core component of the current work.

references.paper_title: Automatic differentiation in machine learning: a survey
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of automatic differentiation methods, including forward-mode AD, which is the core technique behind the proposed SPRY algorithm.
This paper introduces an adaptive optimization algorithm for federated learning, which is used and analyzed in the current work to improve convergence speed and efficiency.
